aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-6396-376 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Inverter output voltage deviation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 06/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 08/04/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 09/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 11/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 14/04/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
